greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = Sum_{d|n} phi(d^4).
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=1} k^3*phi(k)*x^k/(1 - x^k). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 10 2018
program: (PARI) a(n) = sumdiv(n, d, eulerphi(d^4)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Mar 10 2018
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Apr 06 2002
